products.name: Steamed Baozi
products.description: Fluffy steamed buns filled with savoury pork and fresh vegetables. A traditional Chinese favourite!

products.name: Taiwanese Braised Beef
products.description: Tender beef slow-cooked in aromatic soy sauce with star anise and served over rice.

products.name: Crispy Roast Duck
products.description: Succulent duck with perfectly crispy skin, served with pancakes, cucumber, and hoisin sauce.

products.name: Korean Fried Rice
products.description: Spicy kimchi fried rice with vegetables, topped with a fried egg and sesame seeds.

products.name: Vietnamese Pho
products.description: Aromatic beef noodle soup with rice noodles, fresh herbs, and tender beef slices.

products.name: Thai Green Curry
products.description: Creamy coconut curry with chicken, bamboo shoots, and Thai basil. Served with jasmine rice.

products.name: Ipoh Kari Duck Soup
products.description: Malaysian-style curry duck noodle soup with tender duck meat and rich, spicy broth.

products.name: Thai Sweet-Chilli Chicken
products.description: Crispy chicken pieces tossed in our signature sweet and spicy chilli sauce.
